answers.answer: Hi,Blood in the urine or hematuria may be due to  trauma, stones, infections, certain medications, and obstructions of the urinary tract. You can have urine tested again and if it persists, I would recommend that you have this evaluated further to rule out the differentials mentioned. Tiredness or fatigue may be due to stress or underlying medical condition. Take care and regards.

question: i have blood (notvisible), ketones & frothy bubbles in my urine. my gp has tested me about 3monhs ago for diabetes-negative. i feel tired but have NO pain. what d you think?
title: urine
